title: Jefferson National Expansion Memorial: Collections
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Collections               Collections       The Cultural Resources department stores, maintains and provides reference services for the artifact, photograph, archives and library collections of the park. Click on the links to the left to learn more about these collections.  Check out the book spotlight to learn about books in the library collection and  read the Artifact of the Month blog for behind the scenes information about  some of the fascinating objects in the museum collection.    Click here to read our Scope of Collections Statement.
